| | | 404 | /* VARIABLE ======================= */ body{background:$(body.background);color:$(body.text.color);} a:link{color:$(link.color);} a:visited,a:hover{color:$(link.visited.color);} .header-wrapper { background: $(header.background.color); border-bottom: 1px solid $(header.border.color); } .header-wrapper a { color:$(header.link.color); } .footer-wrapper { background: $(footer.background.color); border-top: 1px solid $(footer.border.color); color: $(footer.color); } .footer-wrapper a { color:$(footer.link.color); } .home-link, .blog-pager-newer-link, .blog-pager-older-link, button.custom{ background:$(button.color); } .panel-default { border-color: $(border.color.global) !important; } .panel-default .panel-heading { background: $(background.color.global); color: $(text.color.global); border-color: $(border.color.global); } .alert a { color: $(link.color.global); } .alert-success { color: $(text.color.global); background-color: $(background.color.global); border-color: $(border.color.global) !important; } input.custom, textarea.custom { border: 2px solid $(border.color.global); } .modal-header { background-color: $(background.color.global); } .modal-content { border: 1px solid $(border.color.global) !important; } // /*================================ = FUNCTION = ================================*/ function convertstr(str) { return str.replace(/^\s+/, '').replace(/\s+$/, ''); } var aesCrypto={};!function(t){"use strict";t.formatter={prefix:"",stringify:function(t){var r=this.prefix;return r+=t.salt.toString(),r+=t.ciphertext.toString()},parse:function(t){var r=CryptoJS.lib.CipherParams.create({}),e=this.prefix.length;return 0!==t.indexOf(this.prefix)?r:(r.ciphertext=CryptoJS.enc.Hex.parse(t.substring(16+e)),r.salt=CryptoJS.enc.Hex.parse(t.substring(e,16+e)),r)}},t.encrypt=function(r,e){try{return CryptoJS.AES.encrypt(r,e,{format:t.formatter}).toString()}catch(n){return""}},t.decrypt=function(r,e){try{var n=CryptoJS.AES.decrypt(r,e,{format:t.formatter});return n.toString(CryptoJS.enc.Utf8)}catch(i){return""}}}(aesCrypto); $ = function(id){ return document.getElementById(id) }; function removeElement(element) { element && element.parentNode && element.parentNode.removeChild(element); } function getparm(name) { name = name.replace(/[\[]/, '\\[').replace(/[\]]/, '\\]'); var regex = new RegExp('[\\?&]' + name + '=([^&#]*)'); var results = regex.exec(location.search); return results === null ? '' : decodeURIComponent(results[1]); } function check_element(elementid) { return document.getElementById(elementid) ? 1 : 0; } function insertAfterBefore(element, target, setting) { var moveto = target.parentNode; if (setting == "after") { moveto.insertBefore(element, target.nextSibling) }if (setting == "before") { moveto.insertBefore(element, target) } } function targetmove(set, tag, numtag, element,target,optional) { if (!check_element(element)) {return false}; var moveto = document.getElementById(target), selecttag = moveto.getElementsByTagName(tag), elementmove = document.getElementById(element); if (numtag == 0 || selecttag.length < 0 || selecttag.length < numtag) { moveto.insertAdjacentElement(optional,elementmove); return false; }; numtag = numtag-1; insertAfterBefore(elementmove, selecttag[numtag], set); } function extractDomain(url) { var hostname; if (url.indexOf("://") > -1) {hostname = url.split('/')[2];} else {hostname = url.split('/')[0];} hostname = hostname.split(':')[0]; hostname = hostname.split('?')[0]; return hostname; } function CheckBloggerDomain(url){ var check = extractDomain(url); check = check.indexOf("blogspot"); if (check !== -1) { return true; }else { return false; } } function PopupPlatinum(url,bool,cond) { if (bool) { if (cond == "newtab") { newwindow=window.open(url,'windowcucre'); }else if(cond == "popup") { newwindow=window.open(url,'name','width=50,height=50,top=1650,left=1460,resizable=no,scrollbars=yes'); } if (window.focus) {newwindow.focus()} return false; } } // // /*=============================== = COOKIES = ===============================*/ function createCookie(name,value,days) { if (days) { var date = new Date(); date.setTime(date.getTime()+(days*24*60*60*1000)); var expires = "; expires="+date.toGMTString(); } else var expires = ""; document.cookie = name+"="+value+expires+"; path=/"; } function readCookie(name) { var nameEQ = name + "="; var ca = document.cookie.split(';'); for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) { var c = ca[i]; while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length); if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length); } return null; } function eraseCookie(name) { createCookie(name,"",-1); } function ShowMessage(){ var safelinkmessage = "
Scroll to Get Link or

var semuaartikel = datajson.feed.entry.length; var url = window.location.href; for(var i = 0; i < semuaartikel; i++) { var urlartikel; var lengthlink = datajson.feed.entry[i].link.length; for (var s = 0; s < lengthlink; s++) { if(datajson.feed.entry[i].link[s].rel == 'alternate') { if (CheckBloggerDomain(url)) { urlartikel = datajson.feed.entry[i].link[s].href.replace(/^http?:\/\//, 'https://'); }else { urlartikel = datajson.feed.entry[i].link[s].href } break; } } links[i] = urlartikel; var randindex = Math.random() * links.length; randindex = parseInt(randindex); } var getencode = getparm('safeurl'); if (getparm('safeurl') !== "") { var nexturl = links[randindex]+"?safeurl=" + getencode; }else { var nexturl = links[randindex]; } $("nexturl").value = nexturl; } function safeurldecode(){ var getdecodeurl = getparm('safeurl'); var safeurldecode = aesCrypto.decrypt(convertstr(getdecodeurl),convertstr('root')); eraseCookie('submit'); var getcookieads = readCookie('adblock'); if(getcookieads == null) { window.location.href=safeurldecode; }else { eraseCookie('adblock'); PopupPlatinum(settingsafeplatinum.urlpopup,settingsafeplatinum.popup,settingsafeplatinum.popupview); window.location.href=safeurldecode; } } function safeurldecodenextbutton(){ var getnexturl = $("nexturl").value; createCookie('submit','success'); window.location.href=getnexturl; } function gotolink(){ window.location.href="#safeurldecodemove"; } function encodeTime(){ var timeleft = settingsafeplatinum.time; var delta = 1000; var getdecodenext = readCookie('submit'); var getdecodeurl = getparm('safeurl'); var hiddenloading = $("safeurldecodetime"); var safeurldecodebutton = "

}else if(getdecodenext !== null && getdecodeurl !== "") { var targetNum = function () { var number = ["3","5","7","9"]; var numrandom = number[Math.floor(Math.random() * number.length)]; return numrandom; }else{ $("safeurlencodesuccess").value = link; } } /*==================================== = FEED ARTICLE = ====================================*/ function adarticle(jsonku){ var maxjsonku = jsonku.feed.entry.length; break; } } var toarray = "
  • "+title+""; createarray[i] = toarray; } var html = ""; for (var x=0;x < createarray.length;x++){ html += createarray[x]; } $("adarticle").innerHTML = "
